abstract: Apple's released a major upgrade to its mobile operating system. But before you start to upgrade your devices, please take these easy steps to prevent an accident that could wipe data from your device.
snippet: Apple's released a major upgrade to its mobile operating system. But before you start to upgrade your devices, please take these easy steps to prevent an accident that could wipe data from your device.
lead_paragraph: Apple has released a major upgrade to its operating system for iPhones and iPads. Called iOS 5, the new software, which is a free download, has more than 200 improvements according to its maker.
